my:Details.my:Title: Use of Dual ECDIS (Transas Navi-Sailor 4000 - Full Dual Station) as primary means of navigation.

my:Hazard.my:Description: Input failure - position, course and speed
Charts in use are not corrected up-to- date

my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: a) RNC charts provided for area not covered by ENC charts, RNC's charts backed up with reduced paper chart folio sufficient for safe navigation; b) In areas where neither ENC's nor RNC's are available a full folio of paper charts carried for that area must be carried on board, and relevant corrections obtained and applied.

my:Hazard.my:Description: Operation of the ECDIS system on board carried out by not familiarized / trained OOW

my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: a) Pilots predominantly use radar for navigation b) Master / OOW is always present on the bridge during pilotage to give advice. c) Master is the one to who has the overriding authority and responsibility; all orders from pilots are to be approved clearly by the Master; d) Master is to decide and maintain one ECDIS with preferred settings.

my:Review.my:ReviewMembers: ALL OOWs AND DECK CADETS ARE TO BE INCLUDED HEREBY;

my:Main.my:Footer: Risk Assessment: D28 - Use of Dual ECDIS (Transas Navi-Sailor 4000 - Full Dual Station) as primary means of navigation.
